Module.Content:
<script src="//hangoutsapi.appspot.com/static/hangout.js"></script>
      <script>
		var onStateChange = function(adds, removes, state, metadata) {
		  console.log(adds, removes, state, metadata);
		  state_ = state;
		  metadata_ = metadata;
		};
		gapi.hangout.addStateChangedListener(onStateChange);

		var onParticipantsChange = function(participants) {
		  participants_ = participants;
		  console.log(participants);
		};
		gapi.hangout.addParticipantsListener(onParticipantsChange);
		
		gapi.hangout.addApiReadyListener(function(){alert("app");});
	</script>
